name: My Boyfriend
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Girls Just Want to Have Fun!

Create the love story of your dreams - choose from 5 amazing guys. Which gorgeous one is for you? Charm, chat up and chill out with each different guy - Will you find your true love?
  • Put on your coolest outfit, and make-up then dance the night away!
  • An active life is a healthy life! Have fun working out with your friends.
  • Meet up with your best friends to catch up on the latest fashopns and hot gossip!
  • Enjoy this fun time-with a lot of flirting, relaxing and fun waiting for you...
